definitions.definition: An implement used to separate the fibres of flax by beating them; a scutch .
The swinging part of a flail , especially that which is used on the grain in threshing ; the swipple .

main_definition: ( textiles ) An implement used to separate the fibres of flax by beating them; a scutch .
secondary_definitions: The swinging part of a flail , especially that which is used on the grain in threshing ; the swipple .
